message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROGRAM_AUTHORIZATION_STRATEGY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Authorization Strategy must be specified.
Authorisation Strategy must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_REFERENCE_CANNOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The Reference cannot contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_FV_REFERENCE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Reference entered is too long. Maximum allowed is %1n.

message.name: ERR_FV_HOME_PAGE_CANNOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The Home Page cannot contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_FV_HOME_PAGE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Home Page entered is too long. Maximum allowed is %1n.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: An application case of the same name already exists. Name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERENCE_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: An application case with the same reference already exists. Reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ELIGIBILITY_RULESET_MANDATORY_IF_ELIGIBILITY_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Eligibility Check Ruleset must be specified if an Eligibility Check Strategy is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ELIGIBILITY_STRATEGY_MANDATORY_IF_ELIGIBILITY_RULESET_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Eligibility Check Strategy must be specified if an Eligibility Check Ruleset is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROG_AUTHOR_RULESET_MANDATORY_IF_PROG_AUTHOR_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: Program Authorization Ruleset must be specified if the Program Authorisation Strategy is Application and an Integrated Case Type is specified.
Program Authorization Ruleset must be specified if the Program Authorisation Strategy is Application and an Integrated Case Type is specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_MANDATORY_IF_PROG_AUTHOR_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: Integrated Case Strategy or Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if the Authorization Strategy is 'Application'.
Integrated Case Strategy or Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Application'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_READY_FOR_DETERM_WORKFLOW_CANNOT_BE_SET_IF_STATE_NOT_ENABLED
message.locale: Ready For Determination Workflow can only be specified if the Ready For Determination State Enabled is specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_REQUIRED_IF_PROG_AUTHOR_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: Integrated Case Type must be specified if the Authorization Strategy is 'Application'.
Integrated Case Type must be specified if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Application'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_REQUIRED_IF_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Integrated Case Strategy must be specified if an Integrated Case Type has been specified.
Integrated Case Strategy must be specified if an Integrated Case Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_PLAN_STRATEGY_REQUIRED_IF_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.
Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED_IF_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: Integrated Case Strategy can only be specified if an Integrated Case Type has been specified.
Integrated Case Strategy can only be specified if an Integrated Case Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_PLAN_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED_IF_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: Outcome Plan Strategy can only be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.
Outcome Plan Strategy can only be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_REQUIRED_IF_OUTCOME_PLAN_IS_SPECIFIED_AND_PROGRAMAUTH_IS_APP
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.
Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_REQUIRED_IF_STRATEGY_IS_RULES
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset must be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.
Client Selection Ruleset must be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_SPECIFIED_IF_STRATEGY_RULES_EXISTS
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset can only be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.
Client Selection Ruleset can only be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_CANNOT_BE_USERSELECTION_IF_STRAIGHTTHROUGH_EXISTS
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy cannot be user selection if Straight Through processing is configured.
Client Selection Strategy cannot be user selection if Straight Through processing is configured.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_NOT_REQUIRED_IF_PROGRAMAUTH_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan cannot be specified as the application case specified has a Program Authorization Strategy of Program.
Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan cannot be specified as the application case specified has a Program Authorization Strategy of Program.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTERNAL_OWNER_ORG_OBJECT_NOT_ALLOWED_WHEN_INTERNAL_OWNER_CURRENT_USER
message.locale: Either the Current User or the Assign To field can be set as the internal application owner, both cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLICATION_CASE_ADMIN_CANNOT_BE_CANCELED_WITH_ACTIVE_APPLICATION_CASE
message.locale: This application case cannot be deleted as application cases of this type have already been created.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_TYPE_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: The Integrated Case Type should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Integrated Case Type should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_AUTHORISATION_RULESET_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: The Authorization Ruleset should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Authorisation Ruleset should not be selected if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Program'

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: The Outcome Plan Type should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Outcome Plan Type should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_AUTHORISATION_RULESET_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: The Authorization Ruleset should not be specified if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Authorization Ruleset should not be specified if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: The Integrated Case Strategy should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Integrated Case Strategy should not be selected if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: The Integrated Case Strategy should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Integrated Case Strategy should not be selected if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_PLAN_STRATEGY_SHOULD_NOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM
message.locale: The Outcome Plan Strategy should not be selected if the Authorization Strategy is 'Program'.
The Outcome Plan Strategy should not be selected if the Authorisation Strategy is 'Program'.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_DISPLAY_PAGE_CANNOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The Results Display page cannot contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_DISPLAY_PAGE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Results Display entered is too long. Maximum allowed is %1n.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INERNAL_APP_OWNER_TYPE_REQUIRED_IF_INTERNAL_APP_OWNER_ENTERED
message.locale: Owner Type must be specified if the Owner has been specified for Internal Application.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ONLINE_APP_OWNER_TYPE_REQUIRED_IF_ONLINE_APP_OWNER_ENTERED
message.locale: Owner Type must be specified if the Owner has been specified for Online Application.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXTERNAL_APP_OWNER_TYPE_REQUIRED_IF_EXTERNAL_APP_OWNER_ENTERED
message.locale: Owner Type must be specified if the Owner has been specified for External Application.

message.name: ERR_FV_ISSUES_OWNER_MUST_BE_SELECTED_WHEN_RESOLUTION_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Issues Owner must be selected if Resolution Page is specified.
